messages.messageBody:
Forwarded from another list.
A thoughtful memorial to Fred Rogers.
Deb L
--------- Forwarded message ----------

In Fred Rogers' neighborhood of make-believe, King Friday befriended a
bird named Troglodytes Aedon (the scientific name of the House Wren).
Mr. Rogers loved and appreciated birds as well as children. On my radio
program today, I did a little tribute to him. Here's a link to the
script if anyone is interested.

http://www.lauraerickson.com/Radio/SoundFiles/Current/March/MrRogers.html

Laura Erickson
Duluth, MN


There is symbolic as well as actual beauty in the migration of the birdsÂ…
There is something infinitely healing in the repeated refrains of
nature-the assurance that dawn comes after night, and spring after the
winter.

--Rachel Carson
